A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is a mash up of Empire and Return of The Jedi\, except both of those films were awesome\, this in contrast is the worst Star Wars film made. From the closing scenes it looks like they plan to use the prequel trilogy as their source for inspiration for future films as clearly the writers have no new ideas. Disney has managed to destroy what was a good franchise. I will not watch any future 'Star Wars' films and will instead stick with the memories of the original 6 films. Disney are about to lose a large fan base...
